name: Nicolas Cage Dating Simulator
description:
Made on a whim to learn how to code with the visual novel engine Ren'Py, a new game was born. Though it's something less glamorous than the creators would like to admit.

Introducing Nicolas Cage Dating Simulator, where you can now be with the one you love, but there is another secret dateable character lurking in the game, will you go with him or stay with Nic?
